commit.message: Bugfix: Replace "URL" with "URI" where we aren't actually working with URLs

files.patch:
@@ -225,8 +225,8 @@ FORMS += src/qt/forms/qrcodedialog.ui
 
 contains(BITCOIN_QT_TEST, 1) {
 SOURCES += src/qt/test/test_main.cpp \
-    src/qt/test/urltests.cpp
-HEADERS += src/qt/test/urltests.h
+    src/qt/test/uritests.cpp
+HEADERS += src/qt/test/uritests.h
 DEPENDPATH += src/qt/test
 QT += testlib
 TARGET = bitcoin-qt_test

@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+#ifndef URITESTS_H
+#define URITESTS_H
+
+#include <QTest>
+#include <QObject>
+
+class URITests : public QObject
+{
+    Q_OBJECT
+
+private slots:
+    void uriTests();
+};
+
+#endif // URITESTS_H

@@ -1,15 +0,0 @@
-#ifndef URLTESTS_H
-#define URLTESTS_H
-
-#include <QTest>
-#include <QObject>
-
-class URLTests : public QObject
-{
-    Q_OBJECT
-
-private slots:
-    void urlTests();
-};
-
-#endif // URLTESTS_H
